LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAmalgamating.stages.0.desc: 现在每个座位都稍微软一点了。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAmalgamating.stages.2.desc: 你要让我的屁股变得又圆又软！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAmalgamating.stages.3.desc: 我现在可以坐在任何地方！我的屁股是世界上最舒服的！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.0.labe: 将一个猎物同化为屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.1.labe: 将两个猎物同化为屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.2.labe: 将三个猎物同化为屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.2.desc: 你要让我的屁股变得又圆又软！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.3.labe: 将几个猎物同化成屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusAssimilating.stages.3.desc: 啊！崇拜我的屁股吧——成为我的屁股吧！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusContacting.stages.0.label: 吸收前的肛门快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusContacting.stages.0.descri: 谁说在吸收之前我就不能玩弄我的屁股？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusContacting.stages.1.label: 吸收前的肛门快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusContacting.stages.1.descri: 大家都在争夺我的注意力...〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusLoosening.stages.0.label: 放松以将猎物吸入屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusLoosening.stages.1.label: 放松以吸收多个猎物进入屁股
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusLoosening.stages.1.descrip: 每个人都有足够的空间...〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusPurging.stages.0.label: 清除屁股脂肪中的残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusPurging.stages.1.label: 清除屁股脂肪中的多个残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusReshaping.stages.0.label: 用屁股重塑猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusReshaping.stages.1.label: 用屁股重塑多个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInAnusReshaping.stages.1.descrip: 我不想我的屁股重新变平坦了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPassing.stages.0.label: 通过膀胱排出猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPassing.stages.1.label: 通过膀胱排出两个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPassing.stages.2.label: 通过膀胱排出三个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPassing.stages.3.label: 通过膀胱排出几个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.0.lab: 一个猎物在膀胱中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.1.lab: 两个猎物在膀胱中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.1.des: 就像我体内充满了蝴蝶一样！〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.2.lab: 三个猎物在膀胱中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.2.des: 小心点！别让我提前放你出去！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.3.lab: 几个猎物在膀胱中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderPleasuring.stages.3.des: 我不知道我还能把它们留在那里多久！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.0.label: 一个猎物在膀胱中存储
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.1.label: 两个猎物在膀胱中存储
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.1.descri: 只需收紧就可以让它们保持安静。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.2.label: 三个猎物在膀胱中存储
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.3.label: 几个猎物在膀胱中存储
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderStoring.stages.3.descri: 我想我已经习惯了随时都需要小便的感觉。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderWarming.stages.0.label: 猎物在膀胱中预热
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBladderWarming.stages.1.label: 多个猎物在膀胱中预热
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsAmalgamating.stages.0.d: 每一步都稍微摇晃一下！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsAmalgamating.stages.2.d: 你们都值得我承受额外的压力！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsAmalgamating.stages.3.d: 我甚至可以用胸来推倒一堵墙！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsAssimilating.stages.2.d: 你会让我变得头重脚轻的！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsAssimilating.stages.3.d: 还有谁想让我的胸部鼓起来？别害羞！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsConvertingChemfuel.stag: 在进胸部把一个猎物转化为燃料
这种轻微的灼烧感就是爆炸羊的感受吗？就像它们猛吃了些微辣的辣椒一样……
在进胸部把两个猎物转化为燃料
我想我的胸部应该没有对称问题吧。哇，好热啊！
在进胸部把三个猎物转化为燃料
哇！这肯定比当爆炸羊好多了！
在进胸部把几个猎物转化为燃料
啊，我把猎物转化得很好！这应该能让发电机运行好几个星期了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInBreastsDissolvingChemfuel.stag: 将一个猎物溶解到燃料乳汁中
里面很滑，不是吗？是不是都站不起来了？
将两个猎物溶解到燃料乳汁中
别担心，你们两个不会滑出去的。
将三个猎物溶解到燃料乳汁中
开始变得足够紧了，只有你们就不会滑动出来了。
将几个个猎物溶解到燃料乳汁中
想想看，如果你们都变成石油，将会值很多钱！
将一个猎物分解成燃料乳汁
将两个猎物分解成燃料乳汁
已经乳化了？那就会慢慢变小了。
将三个猎物分解成燃料乳汁
现在开始感觉到一点轻微的灼烧感……
将几个猎物分解成燃料乳汁
啊~很快就要燃烧起来了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageExiting.stages.0.label: 从乳沟中释放猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageExiting.stages.1.label: 从乳沟中释放多个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageContacting.stages.0.la: 预吸收一个猎物于乳沟的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageContacting.stages.0.de: 谁说在吸收它们之前我不能玩我的乳沟？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageContacting.stages.1.la: 预吸收几个猎物于乳沟的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageContacting.stages.1.de: 大家都在争夺我胸部的注意力...〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageLoosening.stages.0.lab: 放松以将猎物吸入乳沟
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageLoosening.stages.1.lab: 放松以将几个猎物吸入乳沟
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageLoosening.stages.1.des: 每个人都有足够的空间...〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePassing.stages.0.label: 将一个猎物部分塞入乳沟
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePassing.stages.1.label: 将几个猎物部分塞入乳沟
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePassing.stages.1.descr: 我的乳沟好像被从各个方向拉扯着！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePleasuring.stages.0.la: 一个猎物在乳房中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePleasuring.stages.1.la: 两个猎物在乳房中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePleasuring.stages.2.la: 三个猎物在乳房中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePleasuring.stages.3.la: 几个猎物在乳房中愉悦
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePurging.stages.0.label: 将一个猎物残留物从乳沟中排除
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePurging.stages.0.descr: 不能让残留物让乳沟变乱乱的!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePurging.stages.1.label: 将几个猎物残留物从乳沟中排除
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavagePurging.stages.1.descr: 太神奇了，你可以在残留物里找到一些奇怪的东西！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageReshaping.stages.0.des: 我会想念我的植入物的……
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageStoring.stages.0.label: 一个猎物储存在乳房中
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageStoring.stages.1.label: 两个猎物储存在乳房
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageStoring.stages.2.label: 三个猎物储存在乳房
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageStoring.stages.3.label: 几个猎物储存在乳房中
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCleavageStoring.stages.3.descr: 我怎么才能把它们都装好啊？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAmalgamating.stages.0.desc: 啊，我觉得你不仅让我的尺寸增加了一倍，还让我的敏感度增加了一倍……~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAmalgamating.stages.1.desc: 我想知道你们是两边各一个，还是前后各一个？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAmalgamating.stages.3.desc: 啊，这个是绝对的“巨根”，有人想尝尝看吗？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAssimilating.stages.1.desc: 太硬了,可能需要一些“软化”~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAssimilating.stages.2.desc: 你们到底要把我的阴茎变得多大、多肉啊~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockAssimilating.stages.3.desc: 我的阴茎简直是快乐的源泉！“巨蟒”还渴望更多！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockContacting.stages.0.label: 预融合的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockContacting.stages.0.descri: 谁说在融合之前我就不能玩弄我的阴茎？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockContacting.stages.1.label: 预同化的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockLoosening.stages.0.label: 放松以将猎物吸收到阴茎上
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockLoosening.stages.0.descrip: 不不不，别走啊！让我们再坐一会儿，享受一会儿吧~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockLoosening.stages.1.label: 放松以将多个猎物吸收到阴茎上
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockLoosening.stages.1.descrip: 就这样把你们抱在我的肉棒上...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockPurging.stages.0.label: 从阴茎上清除残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockPurging.stages.1.label: 从阴茎上清除多个残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockPurging.stages.1.descripti: 只需脱掉所有这些衣服就可以啦。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockReshaping.stages.0.label: 将一个猎物从阴茎还原
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInCockReshaping.stages.1.label: 将几个猎物从阴茎还原t
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyConvertingUrine.stages.0: 将一个猎物在肾中转化成小便
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyConvertingUrine.stages.1: 将两个猎物在肾中转化成小便
有足够的水来浇灌农田了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyConvertingUrine.stages.2: 将三个猎物在肾中转化成小便
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyConvertingUrine.stages.3: 将几个猎物在肾中转化成小便
让你看看什么叫洪水泛滥〜
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyDissolvingUrine.stages.1: 里面连踢腿的空间都没有了对吧？别淹死了！~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyDissolvingUrine.stages.3: ……我可不能把他们都惹毛了。因为现在还不是时候，但很快就会啦。不过，现在得求他们仁慈点……
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyMushingUrine.stages.1.de: 你们两个也没坚持多久。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInKidneyMushingUrine.stages.2.de: 很快，你们就会变成一条黄色的小溪。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.0.label: 分解被吞噬的一个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.1.label: 分解被吞噬的两个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.1.descr: 我几乎再也分不清你们两个了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.2.label: 分解被吞噬的三个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.2.descr: 一堆糊状物的起点和终点在哪里？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesChurning.stages.3.label: 解被吞噬的几个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesDigesting.stages.0.desc: There's no escape for you, swimmer!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesDigesting.stages.1.desc: Do you like being mashed against each other like that?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesDigesting.stages.3.desc: Soon, you'll all be a thin soup!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesProcessing.stages.0.des: I suppose it's time to clean up.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesProcessing.stages.1.des: I wonder how plump you'll make me?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesPleasuring.stages.0.des: I love a good, deep hug...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesPleasuring.stages.3.des: Having a hell of a pool party in here!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.0.label: Prey engulfed for storage
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.1.label: Two prey engulfed for storage
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.1.descri: I think I'm more prey than pred at this point, just by volume!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.2.label: Three prey engulfed for storage
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.3.label: Several prey engulfed for storage
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesStoring.stages.3.descri: I feel like I'm bursting at the seams!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesWarming.stages.0.label: Warming up insides for prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesWarming.stages.0.descri: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesWarming.stages.1.label: Warming up insides for multiple prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInInsidesWarming.stages.1.descri: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneDumping.stages.0.label: 从融膜上脱离残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneDumping.stages.0.descr: 必须保持我的内部清洁！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneDumping.stages.1.label: 从融膜上脱离几个残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneDumping.stages.1.descr: 每个人总是在我部里留下很多垃圾......至少现在排出来的感觉很好！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneExiting.stages.0.label: 从融膜中释放猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneExiting.stages.1.label: 从融膜中释放几个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembraneExiting.stages.1.descr: 我感觉现在自己变得更加柔软了！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembranePassing.stages.0.label: 猎物被部分吞噬
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembranePassing.stages.1.label: 多个猎物被部分吞噬
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMembranePleasuring.stages.1.de: 小心点！你们不会是想把我扯开吧？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthAmalgamating.stages.0.des: 我保证会好好照顾你的。
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthAmalgamating.stages.1.des: 每个嘴唇都有好好照顾哦!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthAmalgamating.stages.2.des: 你们让我的嘴唇丰满且多汁！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthAmalgamating.stages.3.des: 如果你们不出去的话，我会好好亲吻你们所有人~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthAssimilating.stages.2.des: 你们让我的嘴唇丰满且多汁！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthContacting.stages.0.label: 猎物融合进嘴唇前的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthContacting.stages.0.descr: 谁说在猎物融合进嘴唇前我不能玩弄它们？
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthContacting.stages.1.label: 猎物同化成嘴唇前的快感
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthLoosening.stages.0.label: 轻松的将猎物融合进嘴唇
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthLoosening.stages.0.descri: 亲爱的，别介意我吻的温暖。那只是……我的呼吸！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthLoosening.stages.1.label: 轻松的将几个猎物融合进嘴唇
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthPurging.stages.0.label: 吐出嘴唇残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthPurging.stages.1.label: 吐出嘴唇的多个残留物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthReshaping.stages.0.label: 从嘴唇重塑猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInMouthReshaping.stages.1.label: 从嘴唇重塑多个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelContacting.stages.0.label: 用腹部接触猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelAmalgamating.stages.0.des: 有一个小肚子需要拍拍
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelAmalgamating.stages.1.des: 我看上去像怀孕了，哈哈~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelAmalgamating.stages.3.des: 看上去应该是多胞胎吧！
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelExiting.stages.0.label: 从腹部重塑猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelExiting.stages.1.label: 从腹部重塑多个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelLoosening.stages.0.label: 轻松的将猎物融合进腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelLoosening.stages.1.label: 轻松的将多个猎物融合进腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPassing.stages.0.label: 将猎物吸入肚脐
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPassing.stages.1.label: 将多个猎物吸入肚脐
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPleasuring.stages.0.label: 猎物在腹中取乐
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPleasuring.stages.1.label: 多个猎物在腹中取乐
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPurging.stages.0.label: 将残留物从肚脐排除
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPurging.stages.0.descript: 里面好像有一些有趣的东西~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPurging.stages.1.label: 将多个残留物从肚脐排除
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelPurging.stages.1.descript: 猎物在这里丢失的东西，真是令人难以置信……
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelReshaping.stages.0.label: 从肚脐重塑猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelReshaping.stages.1.label: 从肚脐重塑多个猎物
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelStoring.stages.0.label: 猎物存储在腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelStoring.stages.1.label: 两个猎物存储在腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelStoring.stages.2.label: 三个猎物存储在腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNavelStoring.stages.3.label: 多个猎物存储在腹部
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleAmalgamating.stages.2.de: You're gonna make my nips so big and firm!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleAssimilating.stages.3.de: Anyone else wanna give 'em a tweak?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleContacting.stages.0.desc: Who says I can't play with my nip-puffers before I absorb them?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleContacting.stages.1.desc: Perfect! At least one mouth on each tit!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleLoosening.stages.0.label: Loosening up to absorb prey into nipple
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleLoosening.stages.0.descr: The milk's coming; just keep sucking!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleLoosening.stages.1.label: Loosening up to absorb multiple prey into nipples
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNipplePurging.stages.0.label: Pressing remains out of nipple
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNipplePurging.stages.1.label: Pressing multiple remains out of nipples
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNipplePurging.stages.1.descrip: I might actually start lactating for real if I keep this up...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleReshaping.stages.0.label: Reshaping prey from nipple
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInNippleReshaping.stages.1.label: Reshaping multiple prey from nipples
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryConvertingEggs.stages.0.d: I already feel more fertile... I think. Certainly randier!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryConvertingEggs.stages.3.d: OH MERCY CAN SOMEONE PLEASE BREED ME ALREADY?!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.0.d: At least you'll be making new life!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.1.l: Dissolving two live prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.2.l: Dissolving three live prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.2.d: How many eggs will you all make, I wonder?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.3.l: Dissolving several live prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryDissolvingEggs.stages.3.d: I think I'm in for a fun time, once you're all eggified.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.1.labe: Breaking down two prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.1.desc: You two will be put to good use!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.2.labe: Breaking down three prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.2.desc: Gonna need to schedule some dicking-down, and soon!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.3.labe: Breaking down several prey into eggs
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryMushingEggs.stages.3.desc: After life, death; after death, life again.~

LanguageData.RV2_PreyInOvaryWarming.stages.1.descript: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.0.label: Spitting prey out of tailmaw
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.0.descri: Dinner's coming back up... At least it's not out my main mouth.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.1.label: Spitting multiple prey out of tailmaw
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPassing.stages.0.label: Swallowing prey with tail
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPassing.stages.1.label: Swallowing several prey with tail
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPleasuring.stages.0.des: It may not be a true mouth, but it can still explore all your private places!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPleasuring.stages.1.des: Two at once? All the tastier.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatPassing.stages.0.des: Something to grind on while I wait for you to go down...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatPassing.stages.1.des: Any more and I might have to start dragging my tail on the ground...~
How close can I pull you to my stomach without taking you all the way in?~
I can barely keep my tail straight with all this rocking around!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.1.des: Look at that--my tail has an elbow now!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.2.des: I can't even curl my tail anymore!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.3.des: I could knock a building over with my tail!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesConvertingChemfuel.st: There's that groovy burn in my balls!
This is way better than milking boomalopes all day!
Maybe I should get some fire and put on a show...~
Now which generator should I fuck first?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesDissolvingChemfuel.st: What's the matter? Can't stay upright in there?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-cum
Keep thrashing. It's way too slick in there to climb even an inch.
Dissolving three live prey into chem-cum
You're all more useful this way, I promise!
Dissolving several live prey into chem-cum
Was that a lighter? Cute. It's too wet in there to light me up.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesMushingChemfuel.stage: Breaking down two prey into chem-cum
Breaking down three prey into chem-cum
Oh, my loins are heating up now!
Breaking down several prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingChemfuel.stages: Is this gentle burn what boomalopes feel? It's like they slurped down some mild peppers...
Hell--oh hell! This has to be way better than being a boomalope!
Oh, baby, I'm burning so good! This oughta keep the generators burning for weeks!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.0.d: There's that gentle tingle I love...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.1.d: Mmh, I can't wait to have a taste!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.2.d: I bet cows are envious of me!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.3.d: I'll have enough to feed the colony for days... Or just myself.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingChemfuel.stages: Pretty slippery in there, isn't it? Can't keep upright?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-milk
Don't worry, you two won't slide out.
Dissolving three live prey into chem-milk
Starting to get tight enough y'all don't slide around.
Dissolving several live prey into chem-milk
Think how much more valuable you'll all be as oil!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.0.d: Ever wanted to nurture something to the fullest?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.1.l: Dissolving two live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.1.d: You two'll just be milk flowing from my taps here soon.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.2.l: Dissolving three live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.2.d: You think I can't handle a little thrashing in my dugs?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.3.l: Dissolving several live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.3.d: I hope we can drink all of y'all before you spoil!
Stopped trying to fight the slickness already?
Breaking down two prey into chem-milk
Jellified already? Just gotta thin you down, then.
Breaking down three prey into chem-milk
Starting to feel a bit of that gentle burn now...
Breaking down several prey into chem-milk
Oh yeah, here comes the burn, real soon!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.1.labe: Breaking down two prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.2.labe: Breaking down three prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.2.desc: Looks like my milkbag's rounding out...
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.3.labe: Breaking down several prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.3.desc: I can already feel that familiar tingle!

LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.0.label: Prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.0.descript: My udder's laden. I'd be unbalanced if they were in my tits!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.1.label: Two prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.1.descript: I'm not even close to having all my teats plugged!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.2.label: Three prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.3.label: Several prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.3.descript: Is that all of my teats plugged up now? Eh, might as well make sure.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.0.label: Warming up udder for prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.0.descript: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.1.label: Warming up udder for multiple prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.1.descript: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleAmalgamating.stages: You're gonna make my teats so big and firm!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleAssimilating.stages: Anyone else wanna give 'em a tweak?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleContacting.stages.0: Who says I can't play with my teat-puffers before I absorb them?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleContacting.stages.1: That's it! More than one sucker--er, suckler: that's what udders are for!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleDumping.stages.2.de: I don't know if I'll ever stop leaking after this...
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleExiting.stages.2.de: I don't know if I'll ever stop leaking after this...
Loosening up to absorb prey into teat
The milk's coming; just keep sucking!
Loosening up to absorb multiple prey into teats
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePleasuring.stages.1: I only have so many hands! I can't keep up!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePurging.stages.1.la: Pressing multiple remains out of teats
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePurging.stages.1.de: I might actually start lactating for real if I keep this up...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.0.de: Puffier, tighter... and so much more sensitive.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.2.de: One on the left, one on the right, one on the buzzer.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.3.de: How many more can I line my box with?~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAssimilating.stages.2.de: One on the left, one on the right, one on the buzzer.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAssimilating.stages.3.de: I'm *drooling* at the thought of more...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaContacting.stages.0.desc: Who says I can't play with my pussy-puffers before I absorb them?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaContacting.stages.1.desc: Everyone's thirsty for my nectar, huh?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.0.label: Loosening up to absorb prey into labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.1.label: Loosening up to absorb multiple prey into labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.1.descr: There's enough flower for everyone to feast; keep at it!~

LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaPurging.stages.1.label: Fingering multiple remains out of labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaPurging.stages.1.descrip: I honestly might as well just start jilling at this point.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.0.label: Reshaping prey from labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.1.label: Reshaping multiple prey from labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.1.descr: I don't wanna be loose again!
Is this the true meaning of "burn, baby, burn"?
My belly's got that half-full jerrycan "glunk" to it.
I'm leaving puddles of fuel everywhere I go...
I'm leaking more fuel than a shot-up generator!
So what kind of machine do you think you'll power?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-cum
I bet boomalopes don't have this much fun!
Dissolving three live prey into chem-cum
I'm gonna need a barrel for all of you...
Dissolving several live prey into chem-cum
We'll never run out of chemfuel at this rate!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.1.l: Breaking down two prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.1.d: Just gotta refine you two down, now!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.2.l: Breaking down three prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.2.d: Oh my, there's that spicy tingle.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.3.l: Breaking down several prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.3.d: That burning... as though I were a boomalope in heat...~
